Subroutine Qsort(arr, low, high)

   Implicit None

   Integer, Intent(inout) :: arr(*)

   Integer,Intent(in) :: low, high

   Integer :: i, j, pivot, temp

   if (low >= high) return 

   pivot = arr((low + high)/2 )

   i = low 

   j = high 

   do 

      do while (arr(i) < pivot ) i = i+1 

      end do 

      do while (arr(j) > pivot )

         j =j -1 

      end do 

      if (i <=j ) then 

         temp = arr(i)

         arr(i) = arr(j)

         arr(j) = temp

         i=i+1 

         j=j-1 

     end if 

     if (i >j ) exit 

  end do 

  call Qsort(arr, low, j )

  call Qsort(arr, i, high )

function binsearch(arr, n, val) result (idx)

implicit none

integer, intent(in) :: arr(1:n)

integer, intent(in) :: n, val

integer :: low, high, mid, idx

low =1 

high= n 

idx =-1

do while (low <= high)

   mid = (low+high)/2 

   if (arr(mid) == val) then 

      idx = mid 

      exit 

   else if (arr(mid) < val) then 

      low = mid +1 

   else 

      high = mid -1 

   end if 

end do 

end function binsearch

Subroutine Qsort(arr, low, high)

   Implicit None

   Integer, Intent(inout) :: arr(*)

   Integer,Intent(in) :: low, high

   Integer :: i, j, pivot, temp

   if (low >= high) return 

   pivot = arr((low + high)/2 )

   i = low 

   j = high 

   do 

      do while (arr(i) < pivot )

         i = i+1 

      end do 

      do while (arr(j) > pivot )

         j =j -1 

      end do 

      if (i <=j ) then 

         temp = arr(i)

         arr(i) = arr(j)

         arr(j) = temp

         i=i+1 

         j=j-1 

     end if 

     if (i >j ) exit 

  end do 

  call Qsort(arr, low, j )

  call Qsort(arr, i, high )

End Subroutine Qsort

FUNCTION find_index( arr, len, target ) result(idx)

   IMPLICIT NONE

   INTEGER, INTENT(IN) :: arr(:), len, target

   INTEGER :: idx, low, high, mid

   idx = -1

   low = 1

   high = len

   DO

      IF (low > high) EXIT

      mid = (low + high)/2

      IF (arr(mid) == target) THEN

         idx = mid

         RETURN

      ELSE IF (arr(mid) < target) THEN

         low = mid + 1

      ELSE 

         high = mid -1

      END IF

   END DO

   RETURN

END FUNCTION find_index

Program codeforces_637_A

  Implicit None

  Integer :: n, i, j, m, max_count
  Integer, Allocatable :: arr(:), u(:), array_sorted(:), counts_freq(:), counts_so_far(:)

  Read *,n

  Allocate( arr(n) )
  Read *, (arr(i),i=1,n)

  Allocate(array_sorted(n))
  array_sorted = arr
  Call Qsort(array_sorted, 1, n) ! Sort using quicksort

  Allocate(u(n))
  Allocate(counts_freq(n))

  m =0
  max_count =0

  Do i = 1, n
    Integer :: current_value = array_sorted(i)
    If (m == 0) Then
      m =1
      u(1) = current_value
      counts_freq(1) =1
      max_count=1
    Else
      If (Current_value == u(m) ) Then
        counts_freq(m)=counts_freq(m)+1
        If (counts_freq(m) > max_count) max_count = counts_freq(m)
      Else
        m = m +1
        u(m) = current_value
        counts_freq(m) =1
        If (1 > max_count) max_count=1   ! Probably not necessary, but needed for first entry.
        If (counts_freq(m) > max_count) max_count = counts_freq(m)
      Endif
    Endif
  End Do

  Allocate(counts_so_far(m))
  counts_so_far = 0

  Do j =1, n
    Integer :: val = arr(j), found_idx
    found_idx = find_index(u(1:m), m, val)
    counts_so_far(found_idx)= counts_so_far(found_idx)+1
    If( counts_so_far(found_idx) == max_count ) Then
      print *, val
      Deallocate(arr, array_sorted, u, counts_freq, counts_so_far)
      Stop
    Endif
  End Do ! should not reach here in valid input ?

  ! Deallocation all others:
  Deallocate(arr, array_sorted, u, counts_freq, counts_so_far)

Contains

  ! QuickSort subroutine
  Recursive Subroutine Qsort( arr, low, high )
    Integer, Intent(INOUT) :: arr(:)
    Integer, intent(IN) :: low, high
    Integer :: i,j,pivot,temp
    i = low
    j = high
    if( i >= j ) return
    pivot = arr( (low + high)/2 )
    do
      do while( arr(i) < pivot )
        i = i+1
      end do
      do while( arr(j) > pivot )
        j = j-1
      end do
      if( i <= j ) then
        temp = arr(i)
        arr(i) = arr(j)
        arr(j) = temp
        i = i+1
        j = j-1
      end if
      if( i > j ) exit
    end do
    Call Qsort( arr, low, j )
    Call Qsort( arr, i, high )
  End Subroutine Qsort

  ! Find index function
  Function find_index( arr, n, target ) Result ( idx )
    Integer, Intent(IN) :: arr(1:n), n, target
    Integer :: idx, low, high, mid
    idx = -1
    low =1
    high =n
    do
      if( low > high ) exit
      mid = (low + high)/2
      if( arr(mid) == target ) then
        idx = mid
        exit
      else if( arr(mid) < target ) then
        low = mid+1
      else
        high = mid-1
      end if
    end do
  End Function find_index

End Program codeforces_637_A
